TO CREATE A LASTING LEGACY, THE LRE FOUNDATION IS DEVELOPING A SYSTEM OF HIKING TRAILS MARKING THE HISTORICAL ROUTES THAT ALLIED FORCES TOOK IN WW2. THIS PROJECT IN PARTICULAR WILL FOCUS ON U.S. FORCES IN BELGIUM AND ALSO INCLUDE A DIGITAL OUTREACH TOOL.
